description.ko: 갈라진 진흙, 이끼 낀 바위, 흐르는 화산 흑요석 등 지구 표면의 복잡한 질감을 탐구하는 매크로 시네마틱 영상입니다.
description.en: A macro cinematic shot exploring the intricate textures of the Earth's surface, featuring cracked dry mud, moss-covered rocks, and flowing volcanic obsidian.

prompt: High-detail macro cinematography of Earth textures, cracked arid soil transitioning into lush green moss and dark crystalline obsidian, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, organic movement, geological patterns, hyper-realistic, top-down perspective.
